My name is Steve Berry. I am a user experience designer living and working in New York City.

steve@thoughtmerchants.com @thoughtmerchant

IEX Inception

Thought Merchants and Pivotal Labs are teaming up with IEX to improve their business processes to make their business more reliable, sustainable, and maintainable. The first step in producing any sort of software product is sharing domain specific knowledge. We were able to bring together leaders from each of IEX’s departments to get our project started. Here are a few photos from our project kick-off meeting.

Goals, risks, assumptions, and anti-goals documented during an inception.

User stories being laid out and prioirized during our inception meeting.

Using the whiteboard to solve an interaction problem.

Created 29 Sep 2012 by Steve Berry.
